title: Blood Any% [3:44] (RTA)
description: This is the first recorded pb/wr of the new Any% route in Blood, which involves using a "wrong warp/death warp" glitch allowing the player to move across episodes and keep their equipment. In this run you kill all 4 bosses of each episode, in their respective episodes while skipping the majority of the levels. The routing involves making sure we play through the fastest levels in the game and then proceeding to kill each of the bosses.
